A switching decoration is a more limited version of a [[Classes:SwitchableDecoration|switchable decoration]] that can only be [[Thing_Activate|activated]], and not deactivated. ==== Use in [[DECORATE]] ==== An actor derived from SwitchingDecoration must have valid Spawn and Active states. It doesn't need an Inactive state. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SwitchingDecoration : [[Classes:SwitchableDecoration|SwitchableDecoration]] native {}
